item.title: My participation in The Epic Hashnode Writeathon 2022
item.description: About the event The Epic Hashnode Writeathon 2022 was a challenge for write an article that would help to solve big technical problems, get started with a programming language or framework, or other developers become 10x better. There were four categories: Web apps Mobile apps Cloud computing Web3 ðŸ”— See more about the event My participation I participated writing an article about how to integrate in the same app the Google Mobile Services and the Huawei Mobile Services.
